script: function TblRowSpan(col){k = 1; for (i=0;i<document.all('mxh').rows.length-1;i++) { k = i + 1; while (trimstr(document.all('mxh').rows[i].cells[col].innerText) == trimstr(document.all('mxh').rows[k].cells[col].innerText)) { k = k + 1; if (k == document.all('mxh').rows.length){break;} }if (i + 1 != k){document.all('mxh').rows[i].cells[col].rowSpan = k - i;for (j=i+1;j<k;j++){document.all('mxh').rows[j].cells[col].style.display = 'none';}i = k -1;}}}function TblHeadRowSpan(col){ k = 1; for (i=0;i<0;i++) { k = i + 1; while (trimstr(document.all('tblHead').rows[i].cells[col].innerText) == trimstr(document.all('tblHead').rows[k].cells[col].innerText)) { k = k + 1; if (k == 1){break;} } if (i + 1 != k) { document.all('tblHead').rows[i].cells[col].rowSpan = k - i; for (j=i+1;j<k;j++) { document.all('tblHead').rows[j].cells[col].style.display = 'none'; } i = k -1; } }}function TblColSpan(irow){ k = 1; for (i=0;i<document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells.length-1;i++) { k = i + 1; while (trimstr(document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[i].innerText) == trimstr(document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[k].innerText)) { k = k + 1; if (k == document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells.length){break;} } if (i + 1 != k) { document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[i].colSpan = k - i; document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[i].align='center'; for (j=i+1;j<k;j++) { document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[i].width = eval(document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[i].width)+eval(document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[j].width); document.all('tblHead').rows[irow].cells[j].style.display = 'none'; } i = k -1; } }} function scrollDiv(Dir) { document.all('mxhDiv').doScroll(Dir); Timer=setTimeout('scrollDiv("'+Dir+'")',100); } function StopScroll() { try { if(Timer!=null)clearTimeout(Timer); } catch(e){;} } function hiddenCwhDiv() { try { if (document.getElementById('mxh').scrollHeight < (document.getElementById('mxhDiv').offsetHeight - 15) ) { document.getElementById('cwhdiv').style.visibility = "hidden"; } else { document.getElementById('cwhdiv').style.visibility = "hidden"; /*document.getElementById('cwhdiv').style.pixelLeft = document.getElementById('alldiv').offsetWidth - 20 + document.all('mxhDiv').scrollLeft;*/ } } catch(e) { ; } } function iniAllListPage() { var div1=document.getElementById('mxhDiv'); if(div1) { var divHeight=div1.style.height.substring(0,div1.style.height.length-2); var height=document.body.clientHeight-(document.body.scrollHeight-divHeight); height=height+'px'; try{div1.style.height=height;}catch(e){} } div1=null; var Timer; hiddenCwhDiv(); try { document.getElementById('mxh').onresize = new Function("hiddenCwhDiv();"); } catch(e){;}}iniAllListPage();
